Today in Sutherland, it's looking solid with a fun 4ft @12s W swell and fresh 23 mph ESE winds. Best spots include Melvich and Strathy, both offering clean conditions early on. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2ft @10s WNW with light 9 mph SSW winds, making it a quieter day. The day after, surf picks back up to 5ft @12s WNW with light N winds, perfect for catching some waves at Melvich or Strathy. Best: today.
